    • Method Detail

      • addPlace

        void addPlace(int n)
        Add a place in the Petri Net with n tokens. If n is negative, print error message.
        Parameters:
        n: - number of tokens in the place

      • removePlace

        void removePlace(java.lang.String id)
        Remove the selected place by id.
        Parameters:
        id: - input id

      • addPlaceTokens

        void addPlaceTokens(java.lang.String id,
                    int n)
        Add n tokens to the selected place. If the selected place is null, print error message. If n is negative, print error message.
        Parameters:
        id: - input id
        n: - number of tokens

      • removePlaceTokens

        void removePlaceTokens(java.lang.String id,
                       int n)
        Remove n tokens from the selected place. If the selected place is null, print error message. If n is negative, print error message.
        Parameters:
        id: - input id
        n: - number of tokens

      • setPlaceNTokens

        void setPlaceNTokens(java.lang.String id,
                     int n)
        Set n tokens in the selected place. If the selected place is null, print error message. If n is negative, print error message.
        Parameters:
        id: - input id
        n: - number of tokens

      • getNTokens

        int getNTokens(java.lang.String id)
        Get nTokens in the selected place. If the selected place is null, print error message.
        Parameters:
        id: - input id
        Returns:
        nTokens: number of tokens of the place

      • addTransition

        void addTransition()
        Add a transition.

      • removeTransition

        void removeTransition(java.lang.String id)
        Remove the selected transition by id. If the selected transition is null, print error message.
        Parameters:
        id: - input id

      • fireTransition

        void fireTransition(java.lang.String id)
        Fire the selected transition by id. If the selected transition is null, print error message.
        Parameters:
        id: - input id

      • addArc

        void addArc(java.lang.String sourceId,
            java.lang.String targetId,
            int weight)
        Add an arc by sourceId, targetId, weight. If weight is not positive, print error message. If the corresponding place or transition doesn't exist, print error message. If there's already an arc in the same direction between the place and the transition, print error message.
        Parameters:
        sourceId: - id of the source object
        targetId: - id of the target object
        weight: - input weight

      • setArcWeight

        void setArcWeight(java.lang.String id,
                  int weight)
        Set the weight for the selected arc. If weight is not positive, print error message. If the selected object isn't a instance of the class Arc, print error message.
        Parameters:
        id: - input id
        weight: - input weight

      • addEmptyArc

        void addEmptyArc(java.lang.String sourceId,
                 java.lang.String targetId)
        Add an empty arc by sourceId, targetId. If the corresponding place or transition doesn't exist, print error message.
        Parameters:
        sourceId: - id of the source object
        targetId: - id of the target object

      • addZeroArc

        void addZeroArc(java.lang.String sourceId,
                java.lang.String targetId)
        Add a zero arc by sourceId, targetId. If the corresponding place or transition doesn't exist, print error message.
        Parameters:
        sourceId: - id of the source object
        targetId: - id of the target object

      • removeIArc

        void removeIArc(java.lang.String id)
        Remove the selected arc/empty arc/zero arc. If the selected arc/empty arc/zero arc is null, print error message.
        Parameters:
        id: - input id
